_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Yatopia
author: unknown@unknown.com
description: Egg made by X_Shadow_#5962. The blazing fast Tuinity, papermc fork with better performance. Yatopia is made of Akarin, EMC, Lithium, Origami, Purpur, AirplaneLite, Hydrogen, Krypton

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# Yatopia installation script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
apt update
apt install -y curl jq wget
echo -e "Downloading Yatopia"
cd /mnt/server
wget https://api.yatopiamc.org/v2/stableBuild/download?branch=ver/1.16.5 -O server.jar
if [ ! -f server.properties ]; then
echo -e "Downloading MC server.properties"
curl -o server.properties https://raw.githubusercontent.com/parkervcp/eggs/master/minecraft/java/server.properties
fi

variables.name: Server Jar File
variables.description: The name of the server jarfile to run the server with.
